text: Ara yakhana apani tadera nikata kona nidarsana niye na yana, takhana tara bale, apani nijera paksa theke kena amukati niye asalena na, takhana apani bale dina, ami to se mate'i cali ye hukuma amara nikata ase amara para'oyaradegarera kacha theke. Eta bhababara bisaya tomadera para'oyaradegarera paksa theke ebam hedayeta o rahamata sesaba lokera jan'ya yara imana eneche.
